headline: Looking At The Changing Narrative For McDonald's (MCD) After Recent Analyst Revisions
summary: What Changed in the Latest McDonald's Price Target Analysts have recently nudged their modeled fair value for McDonald's from about US$331.20 to roughly US$339.03, alongside a small adjustment in the discount rate from 8.98% to about 8.85% and a tweak in expected revenue growth from around 5.47% to roughly 5.79%. This shift reflects a tug of war between bulls, who point to firm U.S. value positioning and marketing momentum, and more cautious voices, who highlight ongoing category headwinds...
